      • isMouseWithin

        public boolean isMouseWithin(int left,
                             int top,
                             int width,
                             int height)
        Test whether the mouse is above an area in pixels, borders inclusive
        Parameters:
        left - the left border in pixels
        top - the top border in pixels
        width - the width of the area in pixels
        height - the height of the area in pixels
        Returns:
        whether the mouse is within the specified rect

      • transformed

        public RenderContext transformed(int offsetX,
                                 int offsetY,
                                 float scaleX,
                                 float scaleY)
        Transforms this RenderContext to a new one with transformations applied. The original render context is unchanged. Transformations are applied in the order:
        1. Translation
        2. Scaling
        Returns:
        a new RenderContext
